channel.title: Filter the groups claim with a dynamic allow list :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Filter the groups claim with a dynamic allow list Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: This document discusses returning a filtered list of groups that pertain to the user and app. It reads and returns user/group information and pertains to the R aspect of user CRUD.
